channel.title: CVE Feed for Mozilla -- Network Security Services
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mozilla -- Network Security Services

item.title: CVE-2016-5285|2024-08-06T00:53:48.923Z -- mozilla -- network%20security%20services
item.description: A Null pointer dereference vulnerability exists in Mozilla Network Security Services due to a missing NULL check in PK11_SignWithSymKey / ssl3_ComputeRecordMACConstantTime, which could let a remote malicious user cause a Denial of Service.
